basics.name: Maximus Dayton
basics.label: Lead Software Engineer at Sapa / Dragonfly

work.name: Sapa Investment Group / Dragonfly
highlights: Hired 2 engineers to expand our team.
Lead development of patent-pending digital payment processing platform.
Developed website for product engineering arm, Ideamakers
Developed new website for Dragonfly Processing division.
Lead development of supply chain and sales portal for medical cannabis processing.
Lead development of full end-to-end progressive web application for patients and employees of the Dragonfly Wellness Pharmacy.
work.summary: I lead a team engineers to build cloud-native progressive web applications for the medical cannabis industry!

work.name: Sapa Investment Group
highlights: Worked with team to engineer a prototype ios/android application for restaurant ordering and payments.
Built a project visualization platform with Monday.com API integration.
Promoted to lead engineer after 3 months.
work.summary: I joined Sapa as the second engineer hire of the company, I was quickly promoted to lead dev where I expanded and led the new software engineering department.

work.name: HouseIP
highlights: Learned React Native to build hybrid mobile application.
Helped build the company identity and brand.
Helped develop the business model for the company.
Lead marketing and sales efforts.
work.summary: I worked as a Co-Founder / Lead Software Engineer at HouseIP, a small startup company. Together with two other co-founders, we developed a business model, while I was solely responsible for engineering the application.

work.name: Dayton Web Development
highlights: Created an invoice payment platform for a veteran-owned small business.
Created a promotion website for a small town bakery.
Developed a full stack ordering and invoicing platform for a pork farm.
Created promotional website for storage unit rental company.
work.summary: I've been doing freelance web projects for small businesses since I was in high school! Now it's more of a side hustle.

work.name: Tricked Out Accessories
highlights: Managed store during period where the store lost it's manager and was trying to hire a new one.
work.summary: I worked as a sales associate / repair technician at a smartphone accessories / repair store.

work.name: Firehouse Pizzeria
work.summary: I worked as a cook at a local pizzeria, cooking pastas, calzones, pizzas, and more.

awards.title: Employee of the Month
awards.summary: I was nominated for and won the first ever employee of the month award for Sapa Investment Group.

skills.name: Cloud Development
keywords: AWS (Amplify, DynamoDB, S3, Lambda, API Gateway, Cognito)
Firebase (Cloud Functions, Cloud Storage, Cloud Firestore)

projects.name: Dragonfly myWellness
projects.description: A full stack progressive web application for medical cannabis patients to order products, track their orders, earn and use loyalty rewards, and develop their cannabis profile to better understand what products work best for them.
highlights: Planned the architecture of the application and got the project approved by stakeholders.
Hired engineers to build the application from scratch.
Lead development of the application from start to finish.
Worked closely with stakeholders to ensure the application was built to the specifications.
Developed systems to integrate and sync inventory and patient data from state mandated systems.

projects.name: Dragonfly Vendor Portal
projects.description: A full stack web application to give cannabis vendors a platform to order wholesale Dragonfly products, and allow our team to track invoices and inventory.
highlights: Planned the architecture of the application and got the project approved by stakeholders.
Lead development of the application from start to finish.
Worked closely with stakeholders to ensure the application was built to the specifications.
Developed systems to integrate and sync inventory and patient data from inventory management tools.

projects.name: Dragoncoin
projects.description: A patent pending digital payment system to allow medical cannabis patients to purchase digital currency to use at Dragonfly.
highlights: Planned the architecture of the application and got the project approved by stakeholders.
Designed and lead development of system from start to finish.
Created security protocols to protect sensitive information from unauthorized access.
Created ACH payment processing system from scratch.

projects.name: Dragonfly Processing Website
projects.description: A marketing and information website for Dragonfly Processing. Filled with modern design and fun interative features.
highlights: Worked with design team to finalize website design
Built website from scratch using Next.js
Delveloped and integrated custom interactive features

projects.name: Idea Makers Website
projects.description: A marketing website for Idea Makers.
highlights: Finished website from abandoned codebase by previous engineer.

projects.name: Restaurant Application Prototype
projects.description: A prototype mobile application for ordering food and more. Built for Sapa restaurants division.
highlights: Planned the architecture of the application and got the project approved by stakeholders.
Designed and lead development of system from start to finish.
Migrated cloud system from Google Firebase to AWS Amplify.

projects.name: HouseIP
projects.description: An iOS / Android app to expidite the process of finding a house for rent.
highlights: Lead the planning and developement of the application.
Lead marketing of the application.
Helped establish the company and it's identity.
